page.title: 03POPULATION - Block Survey.
page.content:
This part of the survey gives some idea of thje people living in and aroundthe block. AGE: 0-10(81) 11-20(39) 21-30(8) 31-40(75) 41-50(26) 50+(5) YEARS 0-2(33) 2-4(26) 4-6(19 IN 6-8(15) 8-10(11) 10-15(9) HOUSE 15+(9) PREVIOUS15miles(55)Staffs(16)W.Mid(8) HOME S.Eng.(14)N.Eng(2)Others(3) FAMILY 1(2) 2(3) 3(9) 4(60) 5(15)6+(5) RELATIVE0-20m(55) 21-40m(9) 41-60m(6) DIST. 60+m(28) LIKELY YES (38) NO (60) TO MOVE Reasons for move: Countryside(20) Near School(7) Marriage(3) Work(30) Better House(10) Family circumstances(3) Bigger garden(7) Privacy(3)
(RB Berkswich)
